dataList.desc: ได้รับตัวตน
dataList.dlg: Ah... You've done it, you've... found me.

dataList.desc: ทักทายยามเช้า
dataList.dlg: Is there anything you wish? Why don't you come over... and try this with me?

dataList.desc: ทักทายยามลางวัน
dataList.dlg: Judging from the slanted ray of sunlight seeping in... Now must be noon. That's what time it is.

dataList.desc: ทักทายยามเย็น
dataList.dlg: I should light more candles. If it's too dark... you won't see well in the night.

dataList.desc: สนทนา #1
dataList.dlg: It was such a long time... How many hours have passed while we stayed in here?

dataList.desc: สนทนา #2
dataList.dlg: The talismans... shouldn't be too sparse. But... there shouldn't be too many of them on my body, either.

dataList.desc: สนทนา #3
dataList.dlg: These talismans... can impede movement. The more of them are attached... the more the curse piles up.

dataList.desc: สนทนาหลังการผูกมัด 1
dataList.dlg:
Ah... You'll use them with me... thank you.
...Ah! Y-You shouldn't attach them to me, even as a prank!

dataList.desc: สนทนาหลังการผูกมัด 2
dataList.dlg:
The ones on my body... I can't remove on my own.
It's... that kind of curse.

dataList.desc: Idle
dataList.dlg: If you have the time, I'd suggest resting while watching fire. It calms your mind.

dataList.desc: ผูกมัด
dataList.dlg: For the liberation... I'll bear this, even if it's a curse.

dataList.desc: เลือกเข้าทีม
dataList.dlg: So there's something you want cursed.

dataList.desc: เข้าด่าน
dataList.dlg: I'll follow.

dataList.desc: ตรวบสอบตัวละครระหว่างการต่อสู้
dataList.dlg: Stay... focused.

dataList.desc: สั่งจู่โจม
dataList.dlg: Stop there, and stay there.

dataList.desc: ศัตรูติดชะงัก
dataList.dlg: They've become sluggish.

dataList.desc: ติดชะงัก
dataList.dlg: Hkh...

dataList.desc: สังหารศัตรู
dataList.dlg: Into the curse they sink.

dataList.desc: ตาย
dataList.dlg: Ah... So it stops... in the end...

dataList.desc: เช็คผ่าน
dataList.dlg: It worked as we wished.

dataList.desc: เช็คล้มเหลว
dataList.dlg: This, too, is a curse...

dataList.desc: ชัยชนะ
dataList.dlg: We did it. Phew... I hope this brings us closer to the liberation.

dataList.desc: เงื่อนไข EX ผ่าน
dataList.dlg: They have all been stopped... Now, we'll be able to liberate technology.

dataList.desc: พ่ายแพ้
dataList.dlg: It must be... that the cursed can't so much as curse others...
